p.k: In the 16th century, Connor MacLeod (Christopher Lambert) receives a spiritual lesson in self-defense from his master, Mako (Nakano), at a mountain retreat. Soon, an evil warrior, Kane the Magician (Mario Van Peebles), confronts and kills Mako in order to obtain his mystical gifts. Three hundred years later, Kane and his three immortal henchmen, reappear in New York City, where they plot to take over the world.
